text: Faith Alexis Ford (born September 14, 1964, in Alexandria, Louisiana) is an American television and movie actress. She is best known for her role as Corky Sherwood on Murphy Brown and as Hope in the television series, Hope & Faith. == Other websites == *Official web site * * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:American television actors
title: Faith Ford
